div.p: This value set includes codes based on the following rules:

ul.li: Include codes from http://terminology.hl7.org/CodeSystem/v3-ActReason where concept is-a _ControlActReason
Import all the codes that are contained in GenericUpdateReasonCode
Import all the codes that are contained in CombinedPharmacyOrderSuspendReasonCode
Import all the codes that are contained in MedicationOrderAbortReasonCode
Import all the codes that are contained in MedicationOrderReleaseReasonCode
Import all the codes that are contained in PatientProfileQueryReasonCode
Import all the codes that are contained in PharmacySupplyRequestRenewalRefusalReasonCode
Import all the codes that are contained in SupplyOrderAbortReasonCode
Import all the codes that are contained in ControlActNullificationReasonCode
Import all the codes that are contained in StatusRevisionRefusalReasonCode

div.p: This value set excludes codes based on the following rules:

ul.li:
Exclude these codes as defined in http://terminology.hl7.org/CodeSystem/v3-ActReason
CodeDisplayDefinition
_MedicationOrderAbortReasonCodemedication order abort reason**Description:**Indicates the reason the medication order should be aborted.

Exclude these codes as defined in http://terminology.hl7.org/CodeSystem/v3-ActReason
CodeDisplayDefinition
_MedicationOrderReleaseReasonCodemedication order release reason**Definition:**A collection of concepts that indicate why the prescription should be released from suspended state.

Exclude these codes as defined in http://terminology.hl7.org/CodeSystem/v3-ActReason
CodeDisplayDefinition
_PharmacySupplyRequestRenewalRefusalReasonCodepharmacy supply request renewal refusal reason**Definition:**A collection of concepts that identifies why a renewal prescription has been refused.

Exclude these codes as defined in http://terminology.hl7.org/CodeSystem/v3-ActReason
CodeDisplayDefinition
_SupplyOrderAbortReasonCodesupply order abort reason**Definition:**A collection of concepts that indicates why the prescription should no longer be allowed to be dispensed (but can still administer what is already being dispensed).

description.value: Identifies why a specific query, request, or other trigger event occurred.
